replies.body: No only diamond is infinite, if bought through the shop of course.
replies.body_tagged: No only diamond is infinite, if bought through the shop of course.

replies.body: Gold and Emerald used to be unlimited in terms of time periods but now gold has a 3 month limit and Emerald has a 6 month limit.
replies.body_tagged: Gold and Emerald used to be unlimited in terms of time periods but now gold has a 3 month limit and Emerald has a 6 month limit.

replies.body: If your gonna buy a rank get diamond. Every rank is a waste but if you really want one diamond is the way to go, more perks & you pay less money after a year.
replies.body_tagged: If your gonna buy a rank get diamond. Every rank is a waste but if you really want one diamond is the way to go, more perks & you pay less money after a year.

replies.body:
The other ranks aren't a waste.
If you want to financially support the server, then buying a temporary rank is a good way of doing that.

replies.body: If you bought Gold and Emerald before the Omega Update (I think), it's infinite. Anything bought after is 3months and 6months respectively.
replies.body_tagged: If you bought Gold and Emerald before the Omega Update (I think), it's infinite. Anything bought after is 3months and 6months respectively.

replies.body: If you're a regular and are planning to play for a long time, Diamond logically is the best. It has the best perks, and it lasts forever
